b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu: Check into a cozy homestay and explore Thamel for dinner, trying local momo.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 2: Kathmandu Sightseeing: Visit Pashupatinath Temple, Boudhanath Stupa, and Swayambhunath. Enjoy dinner at a local momo restaurant.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 3: Travel to Pokhara: Take a bus to Pokhara. Upon arrival, check into a homestay and stroll along Phewa Lake. Try some momo for dinner.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 4: Pokhara Activities: Morning visit to Sarangkot for sunrise views. Afternoon boating on Phewa Lake. Evening momo at a lakeside restaurant.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 5: Pokhara Adventure: Go rafting in the Seti River. Relax in the evening at your homestay with a momo dinner.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 6: Travel to Chitwan: Take a bus to Chitwan. Check into a homestay and enjoy a traditional Tharu cultural program with momo dinner.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 7: Chitwan National Park: Full-day jungle safari in Chitwan National Park. Return to your homestay for a delicious momo dinner.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 8: Travel to Mustang: Bus journey to Mustang. Check into a homestay and explore the local area. Dinner featuring momo.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 9: Explore Mustang: Visit Muktinath Temple and Kagbeni. Enjoy local momo for dinner.

b1325d49-c766-4e1a-a524-d4aed83e3ab1.Day 10: Return to Kathmandu: Bus back to Kathmandu. Last-minute shopping and momo feast in Thamel. Overnight at a homestay.
